name: NecrOlympics
description:
Raise an undead army to compete at the NecrOlympics - A series of sports designed for the undead.

Part 1:

You will gather your army by raising zombies, skeleton archers, and skeledogs from human corpses. Command your troops to vanquish more humans, only to raise them for your army. Once your satisfied with the size of your hoard, make your way to the NecrOlympics portal to compete! 

Part 2:

You will compete in: 

Zombie Rowing

A bar will move back and forth across the screen, pressing space when it's closer to max will row faster. More zombies = More rowing power.

Skeleton Archery

Aim for the center of the target and rack up points. More skeletons = More arrows.

Skeledog Racing

Didn't quite have enough time to finish this one :(

Post your scores in the comments!

Made as part of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
